resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107675</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107675</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Battle of Gettysburg, July 1-3, 1863</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schlacht von Gettysburg, Juli 1-3, 1863</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bataille de Gettysburg, 1-3 juillet 1863</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A batalha de Gettysburg, julho 1-3, 1863</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La battaglia di Gettysburg, luglio 1-3 1863</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάχη Gettysburg, 1-3 Ιουλίου, 1863</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La batalla de Gettysburg, julio 1-3, 1863</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site presents elements of the battle and its aftermath, including objects used by the soldiers, a lesson plan on the men's experiences, a history of the preservation efforts at the battlefield, and a database about Civil War soldiers</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site stellt Elemente der Schlacht und seiner
Nachmahd, einschließlich die Nachrichten dar, die von den Soldaten 
benutzt werden, einen Lektionplan auf den Erfahrungen der Männer, 
eine Geschichte der Bewahrungbemühungen am Schlachtfeld und eine 
Datenbank über Bürgerkriegsoldaten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site présente des éléments de la bataille et
de sa conséquence, y compris des objets employés par les soldats, un
plan de leçon sur les expériences des hommes, une histoire des 
efforts de conservation au champ de bataille, et une base de données 
au sujet des soldats de guerre civile</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local apresenta elementos da batalha e de seu
aftermath, including os objetos usados pelos soldados, uma planta da 
lição nas experiências dos homens, um history dos esforços da 
preservação no campo de batalha, e uma base de dados sobre soldados 
da guerra civil</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo presenta gli elementi della battaglia
e del relativo guaime, compreso gli oggetti usati dai soldati, un 
programma di lezione sulle esperienze degli uomini, una storia degli 
sforzi di conservazione al campo di battaglia e una base di dati circa
i soldati di guerra civile</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή παρουσιάζει τα στοιχεία της μάχης και 
της συνέπειάς της, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των αντικειμένων που 
χρησιμοποιούνται από τους στρατιώτες, ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για 
την εμπειρία των ατόμων, μια ιστορία των προσπαθειών συντήρησης 
στο πεδίο μάχη, και μια βάση δεδομένων για τους στρατιώτες 
εμφύλιου πολέμου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio presenta elementos de la batalla y de 
sus consecuencias, incluyendo los objetos usados por los soldados, un 
plan de la lección en las experiencias de los hombres, una historia 
de los esfuerzos de la preservación en el campo de batalla, y una 
base de datos sobre soldados de la guerra civil</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107675</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-battle-of-gettysburg-july-1-3-1863</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
